segments.text: What a typical kitchen scene, but with surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window lights up the counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's concentrating on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I notice the faucet is still on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing onto the floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now looking left, the cabinet's open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balancing on a stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might tumble down any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is reaching up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're like little thieves in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can't believe no one's noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
